languages.text: "Ох, дед, это ж Леди Теодора. Она такими делами ворочала — масштабов не нашего ума. Планету в расход пустить — это так, мелочевка по ее меркам".

traits.locale_text: "Ох, дед, это ж Леди Теодора. Она такими делами ворочала — масштабов не нашего ума".

languages.text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."
languages.original_text: "Ох, дед, это ж Леди Теодора. Она такими делами ворочала — масштабов не нашего ума. Планету в расход пустить — это так, мелочевка по ее меркам".

traits.locale_text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. Remember the scale of all the things she dealt with — some of it was too big for our heads. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."
"This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. Remember the scale of all the things she dealt with — some of it was too big for our heads. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."
"This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."
"This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."
"This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."
"This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."

languages.text: 「相手はレディ・シオドーラよ？おじいちゃん。彼女のやってたことは、あたいたちの理解なんか遥かに超えてた。惑星ひとつ潰すくらい、あの人にとっては取るに足らない一手だわ」
languages.original_text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."

traits.locale_text: 「相手はレディ・シオドーラよ？おじいちゃん。彼女のやってたことは、あたいたちの理解なんか遥かに超えてた。惑星ひとつ潰すくらい、あの人にとっては取るに足らない一手だわ」

languages.text: "Wir reden hier von Lady Theodora, alter Mann. Sie hat auf einer Skala operiert, die unsere Vorstellungskraft weit übersteigt. Einen Planeten zu opfern war für sie keine große Sache."
languages.original_text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."

traits.locale_text: "Wir reden hier von Lady Theodora, alter Mann. Sie hat auf einer Skala operiert, die unsere Vorstellungskraft weit übersteigt. Einen Planeten zu opfern war für sie keine große Sache."

languages.text: « C'est de dame Théodora qu'on parle, mon vieux. Elle se livrait à des manœuvres si grandes qu'elles dépassent de loin notre entendement. La destruction d'une planète n'était qu'un détail pour elle. »
languages.original_text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."

traits.locale_text: « C'est de dame Théodora qu'on parle, mon vieux. Elle se livrait à des manœuvres si grandes qu'elles dépassent de loin notre entendement. La destruction d'une planète n'était qu'un détail pour elle. »

languages.text: «Estamos hablando de lady Theodora, anciano. Operaba a una escala que escapa a nuestra comprensión. Echar a perder un planeta no era algo que le quitase el sueño».
languages.original_text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."

traits.locale_text: «Estamos hablando de lady Theodora, anciano. Operaba a una escala que escapa a nuestra comprensión. Echar a perder un planeta no era algo que le quitase el sueño».

languages.text: “咱们说的可是西奥多拉夫人啊，老家伙。她做事的规模已经远远超出了我们的理解范围。对她而言，浪费掉一颗行星，恐怕算不上什么值得一提的事情。”
languages.original_text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."

traits.locale_text: “咱们说的可是西奥多拉夫人啊，老家伙。她做事的规模已经远远超出了我们的理解范围。对她而言，浪费掉一颗行星，恐怕算不上什么值得一提的事情。”

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora'dan bahsediyoruz ihtiyar. Yaptıkları bizim kapasitemizi aşar. Koca gezegeni gözünü kırpmadan harcamak, onun için işten bile değil."
languages.original_text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Theodora'dan bahsediyoruz ihtiyar. Yaptıkları, bizim kapasitemizi aşar. Koca gezegeni gözünü kırpmadan harcamak, onun için işten bile değil."

languages.original_text: "This is Lady Theodora we're talking about, old man. She was operating on a scale far beyond our understanding. Wasting a planet wasn't much of a play for her."
